overview_of_class: Elastic, plastic deformation and fracture of materials, emphasizing structure/property relations and symmetry. Role of imperfections, state of stress, temperatures, strain-rate, and environment on mechanical behavior of metals, polymers, ceramics and composites is examined. Introduction to Finite Element Modeling, connecting to experimental measurement in laboratory.
name: Symmetry and Mechanical Properties of Materials
subject: MAT_SCI
